rooms.name: West of House
rooms.description: This is an open field west of a white house, with a boarded front door.

rooms.name: North of House
rooms.description: You are facing the north side of a white house.  There is no door here, and all the windows are barred.

items.name: house
items.description: The house is a beautiful colonial house which is painted white.  It is clear that the owners must have been extremely wealthy.

rooms.name: Forest
rooms.description: This is a dimly lit forest, with large trees all around.  One particularly large tree with some low branches stands here.

observers.message: You hear in the distance the chirping of a song bird.

rooms.name: Up a Tree
rooms.description: You are about 10 feet above the ground nestled among some large branches.  The nearest branch above you is above your reach.

items.name: nest
items.environmentalText: On the branch is a small birds nest.

items.name: egg
items.description: I see nothing special about the jewel-encrusted egg.
items.environmentalText: In the bird's nest is a large egg encrusted with precious jewels, apparently scavenged somewhere by a childless songbird.  The egg is covered with fine gold inlay, and ornamented in lapis lazuli and mother-of-pearl.  Unlike most eggs, this one is hinged and has a delicate looking clasp holding it closed.  The egg appears extremely fragile.
